I heard something about there's going to be a new Devil May Cry.

I fucking doubt that but apparently Capcom announced it or something during the Tokyo game show and they said there should be a teaser coming out 2015.

And no its not DmC. Any thoughts? [/bq]
I fucking called it.  DmC is probably going to be the equivalent of Other M in that Capcom is probably going pretend from now on that it doesn't exist.

topics.body:
The year 2056, the year of the tacoless world. 

Taco's are now on the verge of extinction and the last remaining Taco's are holding up shelter from the evil Cult "La Vegan Pride".

La Vegan Pride are an evil group of Vegans determined to erase the food from existence because of how it "Tainted" the vegetables by being mixed in with such "Degrading" Meat.

Because of this the U.S. and the Japanese have Banded together to make the ultimate fighting machine.

"The Extra Large" This Giant Mobile Suit is loaded with the highest and tasty meat in the galaxy as weaponry to defeat the evil that is "La Vegan Pride".

This is our future, This is our story.

"A world without tacos is a world without sex and is a world not worth living for" - Obama Ax 2.0
